client_profile_employment_history_3_comp: Atresmedia Corporación de Medios de Comunicación S.A.
client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM met Muñoz Gómez Morales at a yacht party in Madrid. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Muñoz Gómez Morales is a 50 year old and comes from Spain.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Muñoz Gómez Morales is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Muñoz completed his secondary education at IES José Manuel Blecua Pamplona in 1994.
Muñoz attended University of Valencia and graduated in 1998.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Muñoz Gómez Morales is a seasoned professional with over 27 years of experience.
In 1998, Muñoz Gómez Morales started working as a Journalist at Telefónica S.A., marking the beginning of his successful career.
In 2005, he moved to Mediaset España Comunicación S.A. to work as a Editor, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
His tenure as a Publisher at PRISA Noticias S.A. from 2007 to 2010 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
After 12 years of dedication, he assumed the role of TV/Radio Host at Atresmedia Corporación de Medios de Comunicación S.A. in 2011, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
He has been a Media Conglomerate Owner at Telefónica S.A. since 2016, consistently demonstrating his ability to adapt, innovate, and thrive in an ever-changing environment.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
While working, he saved 470000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns townhouse in Gijón, where he resides. It is worth 770000 EUR.

He inherited 2730000 EUR from his grandmother, a well-known Tech Entrepreneur, in 2010, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
client_description_Client_Summary: In summary, Muñoz has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
